AlertDescription.AlertsQuery: select * from SMS_Alert where AlertState = 0 and FeatureGroup = 2 and IsIgnored = 0
SELECT * FROM sms_alert WHERE AlertState=0 and FeatureArea in (3, 14) and IsIgnored = 0

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT * FROM SMS_ApplicationLatest WHERE IsHidden=0 ORDER BY LocalizedDisplayName

SELECT dt.* FROM SMS_DeploymentType AS dt JOIN SMS_CIRelation AS rel ON dt.CI_ID=rel.ToCIID JOIN SMS_Application AS app ON app.CI_ID = rel.FromCIID WHERE app.CI_UniqueID='##SUB:CI_UniqueID##' AND rel.relationtype=9 ORDER BY rel.Priority
SELECT * FROM SMS_DeploymentSummary WHERE ModelName = '##SUB:ModelName##' ORDER BY DeploymentTime
SELECT * FROM SMS_PhasedDeployment WHERE DeploymentObjectType = 2 AND DeploymentObjectID = '##SUB:CI_ID##'

SELECT DISTINCT tsp.* FROM SMS_ObjectContentExtraInfo content INNER JOIN SMS_TaskSequencePackageReference ts ON ts.RefPackageID = content.PackageID INNER JOIN SMS_TaskSequencePackage tsp ON tsp.PackageID = ts.PackageID INNER JOIN SMS_Application app ON app.LocalizedDisplayname = content.SoftwareName WHERE content.Softwarename = '##SUB:LocalizedDisplayName##'

SELECT ag.* FROM SMS_ApplicationLatest AS app JOIN SMS_ApplicationGroupItem AS item ON app.CI_ID = item.Item_CIID JOIN SMS_ApplicationGroup AS ag ON item.ModelName = ag.ModelName WHERE ag.IsLatest = 1 AND ag.IsHidden = 0 AND app.CI_UniqueID = '##SUB:CI_UniqueID##' ORDER BY ag.LocalizedDisplayName
SELECT * FROM SMS_ApplicationGroup WHERE IsHidden=0 AND IsLatest=1 ORDER BY LocalizedDisplayName
SELECT app.* FROM SMS_ApplicationGroupItem AS item JOIN SMS_ApplicationLatest app on app.CI_ID = item.Item_CIID WHERE item.ModelName='##SUB:ModelName##' ORDER BY item.Item_Order
SELECT * FROM SMS_DeploymentSummary WHERE ModelName = '##SUB:ModelName##' ORDER BY DeploymentTime
SELECT * FROM SMS_LicensedVppApps WHERE Platform = 0 OR Platform = 1
SELECT * FROM SMS_Package WHERE ActionInProgress!=3 AND PackageType = 0 ORDER BY Manufacturer, Name, Version, Language
SELECT * FROM SMS_Program WHERE PackageId='##SUB:PackageId##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_DeploymentSummary WHERE PackageID = '##SUB:PackageID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_UserApplicationRequest ORDER BY Application

SELECT DataType, SourceSite, GlobalConditionType,InUse, IsReadOnly, LocalizedDisplayName, LocalizedDescription, CI_ID, CI_UniqueID, LocalizedCategoryInstanceNames, PlatformType, PlatformCategoryInstance_UniqueIDs, ModelName FROM SMS_GlobalCondition WHERE IsHidden = 0
SELECT * FROM SMS_VirtualEnvironment WHERE IsHidden=0 AND isLatest=1 ORDER BY LocalizedDisplayName
SELECT * FROM SMS_WinRTSideLoadingKey
SELECT t.* FROM SMS_MAMPolicyTemplate t, SMS_CIRelation relation, SMS_AppRestrictionSettings appConfig WHERE relation.FromCIID = t.CI_ID AND appConfig.CI_ID = relation.ToCIID AND IsLatest = 1

SELECT t.* FROM SMS_MAMPolicyTemplate t, SMS_CIRelation relation, SMS_AfwAppConfigSettings afwConfig, MDM_GenericAppConfiguration iosConfig WHERE relation.FromCIID = t.CI_ID AND (afwConfig.CI_ID = relation.ToCIID OR iosConfig.CI_ID = relation.ToCIID) AND IsLatest = 1

SELECT deploy.* FROM SMS_DeploymentSummary deploy INNER JOIN SMS_CIRelation relation ON relation.FromCIID = deploy.CI_ID WHERE relation.ToCIID IN ( SELECT FromCIID FROM SMS_CIRelation WHERE RelationType = 24 AND ToCIID = ##SUB:CI_ID##) ORDER BY DeploymentTime

AlertDescription.AlertsQuery: SELECT * FROM sms_alert WHERE AlertState=0 and FeatureArea=4 and IsIgnored = 0

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT ci.* FROM SMS_SoftwareUpdate ci WHERE ci.CI_ID NOT IN ( SELECT CI_ID FROM SMS_CIAllCategories WHERE CategoryInstance_UniqueID='UpdateClassification:3689bdc8-b205-4af4-8d4a-a63924c5e9d5') AND ci.CI_ID NOT IN (SELECT CI_ID FROM SMS_CIAllCategories WHERE CategoryInstance_UniqueID='Product:30eb551c-6288-4716-9a78-f300ec36d72b') ORDER BY DateRevised DESC
SELECT * FROM SMS_UpdatesAssignment AS ua WHERE ua.AssignedCIs = ##SUB:CI_ID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_PhasedDeployment WHERE DeploymentObjectType = 1 AND DeploymentObjectID = '##SUB:CI_ID##'

PanePageDescription.Description: Shows the System Compliance for the selected update

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT SMS_CombinedDeviceResources.* FROM SMS_CombinedDeviceResources JOIN SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus ON SMS_CombinedDeviceResources.ResourceID = SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.MachineID AND SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.Status = 2 WHERE SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.CI_ID = ##SUB:CI_ID##

SecurityFlagsDetailDescription.BitName: NetworkAccess | Modify CH Settings | Enforce Security

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT * FROM SMS_AuthorizationList ORDER BY LocalizedDisplayName
SELECT * FROM SMS_updateGroupAssignment WHERE AssignedUpdateGroup = ##SUB:CI_ID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_PhasedDeployment WHERE DeploymentObjectType = 1 AND DeploymentObjectID = '##SUB:CI_ID##'

PanePageDescription.Description: Shows the System Compliance for the selected update

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT DISTINCT SMS_CombinedDeviceResources.* FROM SMS_CombinedDeviceResources JOIN SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus ON SMS_CombinedDeviceResources.ResourceID = SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.MachineID AND SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.Status = 2 JOIN SMS_CIRelation ON SMS_CIRelation.FromCIID = ##SUB:CI_ID## AND SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.CI_ID=SMS_CIRelation.ToCIID AND SMS_CIRelation.RelationType=1

SecurityFlagsDetailDescription.BitName: NetworkAccess | Modify CH Settings | Enforce Security

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT pkg.* FROM SMS_SoftwareUpdatesPackage pkg WHERE pkg.ActionInProgress!=3 ORDER BY pkg.Name
SELECT * FROM SMS_AutoDeployment WHERE IsServicingPlan=0
SELECT * FROM SMS_ADRDeploymentSettings WHERE RuleID = ##SUB:AutoDeploymentID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_ISVCatalogs

AlertDescription.AlertsQuery: SELECT * FROM sms_alert WHERE AlertState=0 and FeatureArea=12 and IsIgnored = 0

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT * FROM SMS_Driver ORDER BY LocalizedDisplayName
SELECT CI_ID, CI_UniqueID, ModelManufacture, ModelName FROM SMS_DriverModel WHERE CI_ID='##SUB:CI_ID##'
SELECT PackageID, Name, PackageType FROM SMS_DriverContainer WHERE CI_ID = '##SUB:CI_ID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_DriverPackage ORDER BY Name, Version
SELECT * FROM SMS_ImagePackage WHERE ActionInProgress!=3 ORDER BY Name
SELECT * FROM SMS_ImageInformation WHERE PackageID = '##SUB:PackageID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_ImageDiskInformation WHERE PackageID = '##SUB:PackageID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_ImageUpdateStatus WHERE ImagePackageID = '##SUB:PackageID##' AND UpdateStatus != 4
SELECT * FROM SMS_OperatingSystemInstallPackage WHERE ActionInProgress!=3 ORDER BY Name
SELECT * FROM SMS_ImageInformation WHERE PackageID = '##SUB:PackageID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_ImageDiskInformation WHERE PackageID = '##SUB:PackageID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_ImageUpdateStatus WHERE ImagePackageID = '##SUB:PackageID##' AND UpdateStatus != 4
SELECT * FROM SMS_BootImagePackage WHERE ActionInProgress!=3 ORDER BY Name
SELECT * FROM SMS_ImageInformation WHERE PackageID = '##SUB:PackageID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_TaskSequencePackage ORDER BY Name
SELECT * FROM SMS_TaskSequencePackageReference WHERE PackageID = '##SUB:PackageID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_DeploymentSummary WHERE PackageID = '##SUB:PackageID##' AND (CollectionName !='')
SELECT * FROM SMS_PhasedDeployment WHERE DeploymentObjectType = 0 AND DeploymentObjectID = '##SUB:PackageID##'

SELECT ci.* FROM SMS_SoftwareUpdate ci WHERE ci.CI_ID IN (SELECT CI_ID FROM SMS_CIAllCategories WHERE CategoryInstance_UniqueID='UpdateClassification:3689bdc8-b205-4af4-8d4a-a63924c5e9d5') ORDER BY ci.DateRevised DESC
SELECT * FROM SMS_UpdatesAssignment AS ua WHERE ua.AssignedCIs = ##SUB:CI_ID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_PhasedDeployment WHERE DeploymentObjectType = 1 AND DeploymentObjectID = '##SUB:CI_ID##'

PanePageDescription.Description: Shows the System Compliance for the selected update

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT SMS_CombinedDeviceResources.* FROM SMS_CombinedDeviceResources JOIN SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus ON SMS_CombinedDeviceResources.ResourceID = SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.MachineID AND SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.Status = 2 WHERE SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.CI_ID = ##SUB:CI_ID##

SecurityFlagsDetailDescription.BitName: NetworkAccess | Modify CH Settings | Enforce Security

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT * FROM SMS_AutoDeployment WHERE IsServicingPlan=1
SELECT * FROM SMS_ConfigurationPolicy WHERE IsLatest = 1 AND CategoryInstance_UniqueIDs = 'SettingsAndPolicy:SMS_WindowsUpdateForBusinessConfigurationSettings' ORDER BY LocalizedDisplayName

SELECT deploy.* FROM SMS_DeploymentSummary deploy INNER JOIN SMS_ConfigurationPolicyAssignment assignment ON deploy.AssignmentID=assignment.AssignmentID INNER JOIN SMS_ConfigurationPolicy configpol ON assignment.AssignedCIs=configpol.CI_ID WHERE configpol.CI_ID=##SUB:CI_ID## AND configpol.CategoryInstance_UniqueIDs='SettingsAndPolicy:SMS_WindowsUpdateForBusinessConfigurationSettings'
SELECT * FROM SMS_M365DeploymentPlanDashboard

SELECT ci.* FROM SMS_SoftwareUpdate ci WHERE ci.CI_ID IN (SELECT CI_ID FROM SMS_CIAllCategories WHERE CategoryInstance_UniqueID='Product:69010383-ff55-4227-bd6c-d91c26f2643b') ORDER BY ci.DateRevised DESC
SELECT * FROM SMS_UpdatesAssignment AS ua WHERE ua.AssignedCIs = ##SUB:CI_ID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_PhasedDeployment WHERE DeploymentObjectType = 1 AND DeploymentObjectID = '##SUB:CI_ID##'

PanePageDescription.Description: Shows the System Compliance for the selected update

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT SMS_CombinedDeviceResources.* FROM SMS_CombinedDeviceResources JOIN SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus ON SMS_CombinedDeviceResources.ResourceID = SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.MachineID AND SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.Status = 2 WHERE SMS_UpdateComplianceStatus.CI_ID = ##SUB:CI_ID##

SecurityFlagsDetailDescription.BitName: NetworkAccess | Modify CH Settings | Enforce Security

QueryDescription.Query: SELECT ci.* FROM SMS_SoftwareUpdate ci WHERE (ci.CI_ID NOT IN (SELECT CI_ID FROM SMS_CIAllCategories WHERE CategoryInstance_UniqueID='UpdateClassification:3689bdc8-b205-4af4-8d4a-a63924c5e9d5')) AND ( CI_ID IN (SELECT CI_ID FROM SMS_CIAllCategories WHERE CategoryInstance_UniqueID='Product:30eb551c-6288-4716-9a78-f300ec36d72b') ) ORDER BY DateRevised DESC
SELECT * FROM SMS_UpdatesAssignment AS ua WHERE ua.AssignedCIs = ##SUB:CI_ID##
SELECT * FROM SMS_PhasedDeployment WHERE DeploymentObjectType = 1 AND DeploymentObjectID = '##SUB:CI_ID##'
SELECT * FROM SMS_Scripts WHERE Feature = 0 ORDER BY ScriptName
